document_data.name: Flame Ray
document_data.mainbody: '''''Flame ray''''' was an [[Arcane magic|arcane]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] that improved upon the ''[[burning hands]]'' spell.
document_data.Effects: This spell behaved similar to ''burning hands'', but caused more physical harm and took slightly longer to cast. The cone of flame extended beyond the caster's fingertips to {{SI|20|feet|long=yes}}.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
document_data.History: This spell was found within the ''[[Book of the Silver Talon]]''.
